mapper.select: SELECT SALES_NO AS salesNo, ADMIN_NO AS adminNo, INCOME, MEMO, INSERT_DATE AS insertDate FROM SALES WHERE ADMIN_NO = #{map.adminNo} AND INSERT_DATE BETWEEN #{map.startTime} AND #{map.endTime} ORDER BY INSERT_DATE DESC LIMIT #{map.startRow}, #{map.pageSize}

SELECT USER_NO AS userNo, USER_ID AS userId, NAME, SEX, PHONE, AGE, INSERT_DATE AS insertDate FROM USER WHERE NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{map.searchValue}, '%') ORDER BY NAME DESC, INSERT_DATE DESC LIMIT #{map.startRow}, #{map.pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER WHERE NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{map.searchValue}, '%')

SELECT r.review_no as reviewNo, r.review_content as reviewContent, r.user_id as userId, r.admin_no as adminNo, s.star_point as star FROM REVIEW AS r, STAR AS s WHERE r.admin_no = s.admin_no AND r.user_id = s.user_id AND r.admin_no = #{map.searchValue} ORDER BY r.user_id DESC LIMIT #{map.startRow}, #{map.pageSize}
SELECT count(*) FROM REVIEW AS r, STAR AS s WHERE r.admin_no = s.admin_no AND r.user_id = s.user_id AND r.admin_no = #{map.searchValue}
